testcase.name: ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > generates initial ledger state deterministically
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves a Tier 1 loan and caps at the max amount
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves a Tier 2 loan and gives the requested amount
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves a Tier 3 loan
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > rejects a loan for a non-eligible applicant
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > creates multiple loans for the same user with incrementing IDs
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws an error if the user is blacklisted
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > allows admin to blacklist and remove a user
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > migrates a small number of loans (1 batch) and cleans up
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > migrates multiple batches of loans (7 loans) correctly
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws an error if user tries to requestLoan during migration
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > migrates loans to a new PIN that already has loans
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws when requesting loan with zero amount
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws when blacklisted user tries to change PIN
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws when changing PIN to the same value
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > allows admin to transfer admin role to new admin
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves exactly at Tier 1 boundary (score=700, income=2000, tenure=24)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > falls to Tier 2 when just below Tier 1 threshold (score=699)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves exactly at Tier 2 boundary (score=600, income=1500)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > falls to Tier 3 when just below Tier 2 threshold (score=599)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > approves exactly at Tier 3 boundary (score=580)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > rejects when just below Tier 3 threshold (score=579)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > falls to Tier 2 when Tier 1 income requirement not met
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > falls to Tier 2 when Tier 1 tenure requirement not met
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws when non-admin tries to blacklist a user
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws when non-admin tries to remove from blacklist
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > throws when non-admin tries to transfer admin
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > generates same public key for same user and PIN (determinism)
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > generates different public key for same user with different PIN
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > generates different public key for different users with same PIN
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > blacklisting an already blacklisted user is idempotent
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > removing a non-blacklisted user from blacklist does not throw
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > same user with different PINs has separate loan records
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > blacklisting a different Zswap key does not affect the caller
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > new admin can perform admin operations after transfer
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > old admin cannot perform admin operations after transfer
ZKLoanCreditScorer smart contract > can chain multiple admin transfers
